message.name: ERR_BUDGETADJUSTMENT_XRV_CREATION_DATE_BEFORE_FUND_START_DATE
message.locale: The creation date, %1d, must be on or after the fund start date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_BUDGETADJUSTMENT_XRV_CREATION_DATE_AFTER_FUND_END_DATE
message.locale: The creation date, %1d, must be on or before the fund end date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_BUDGETADJUSTMENT_XRV_CREATION_DATE_BEFORE_FISCAL_YEAR_START_DATE
message.locale: The creation date, %1d, must be on or after the fiscal year start date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_BUDGETADJUSTMENT_XRV_CREATION_DATE_AFTER_FISCAL_YEAR_END_DATE
message.locale: The creation date, %1d, must be on or before the fiscal year end date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_BUDGETADJUSTMENT_XRV_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_IS_CANCELLED_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: This fund fiscal year line Item has already been canceled, a new budget adjustment cannot be created.
This fund fiscal year line Item has already been cancelled, a new budget adjustment cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_BUDGETADJUSTMENT_XRV_FUNDFISCALYEARSETASIDE_IS_CANCELLED_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: This fund fiscal year set aside has already been canceled, a new budget adjustment cannot be created.
This fund fiscal year set aside has already been cancelled, a new budget adjustment cannot be created.
